root: ^That was exciting! Anyways, pleased to meet you. I'm-
^WHAT!! You just come crashing through my window???
^Oh. Well it wouldn't open from the outside.
^I think it was the next logical action.
^AS I was saying, I'm a recruiter with a nose for a good talent!
^And on my daily bagel run- they run a really good shop over there I'll give you the address- my nose smelled a smell of great talent! So, tell me about yourself!
^The recruiter begins dusting off broken glass shards from the fresh bagel that was in their pocket.
^Uh. Right. Erm, my name is Justin and I use pronouns he/him.
^Excellent, pleased to meet you. You can call me Recruiter and I use she/her pronouns.
^She grabs a glass-free bite out of her bagel. She mumbles with a mouthful of bagel.
^And well I do happen to be looking for work!

^Let's do this then. I see some interesting projects laid out around your apartment. How about I walk around the apartment using the mouse and left click to see what they're on about. And if I want to get to know more about you I'll left click on you and we can have a good ol' fashioned dialogue about it.
^Very specific but I guess you're the professional!
